About Me

Hello! My name is Brian Viveiros and I enjoy everything that is the internet. My interest in web development started when a friend of mine told me about the Odin Project back in early 2023. I have a background in game development which i have transferable coding experience that i decided it would be a good idea to expand my skillset even further!
